# FamilyActivityIconView

**Structure**

A type-erased view representing the icon of the family activity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct FamilyActivityIconView
```

## Overview

Family Controls uses this type as a generic constraint for the `Icon` of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/Label] instances it creates.

## Label Constraints

- **FamilyActivityTitleView**: A type-erased view representing the title of the family activity.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- View
